svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Share of children in employment, boys vs girls, 2015
Share of boys (vs. girls) ages 7-14 involved in economic activity for at least one hour in the reference week of the
Children in employment, male (% of male children ages 7-14)
Children in employment, female (% of female children ages 7-14)
